Sheet1.TASK LIST: PREPARE SOIL USING ORGANIC METHODS
PLANT NON-GMO SEEDS AND MANAGE CROPS ORGANICALLY
CONTROL PESTS AND WEEDS WITH ORGANIC SOLUTIONS
USE COMPOST AND ORGANIC FERTILIZERS
PRACTICE CROP ROTATION
HARVEST WITHOUT SYNTHETIC CHEMICALS
KEEP RECORDS OF PLANTING AND HARVEST ACTIVITIES
PREPARE SOIL FOR PLANTING BY TILLING AND FERTILIZING.
SOW SEEDS AND PLANT SEEDLINGS.
WATER CROPS AND MONITOR SOIL MOISTURE LEVELS.
MANAGE WEEDS AND APPLY PEST CONTROL METHODS.
COLLECT AND HANDLE VEGETABLES AT PEAK RIPENESS.
MAINTAIN TOOLS, EQUIPMENT, AND FARM INFRASTRUCTURE.
PERFORM BASIC ARC WELDING (STICK WELDING) ON STEEL, IRON, AND OTHER METALS.

Sheet1.TASK LIST: INSTALL AND REPAIR PLUMBING SYSTEMS, INCLUDING PIPES, FITTINGS, WATER HEATERS, AND FIXTURES.
INSPECT AND TEST PLUMBING SYSTEMS TO ENSURE PROPER FUNCTIONALITY AND COMPLIANCE WITH BUILDING CODES.
TROUBLESHOOT AND RESOLVE PLUMBING ISSUES, INCLUDING LEAKS, CLOGS, AND SYSTEM FAILURES.
READ BLUEPRINTS AND TECHNICAL DRAWINGS TO DETERMINE PLUMBING SYSTEM LAYOUT.
ENSURE ALL PLUMBING WORK MEETS SAFETY, QUALITY, AND CODE STANDARDS.
